verses.name: Romans 5:1
verses.text: Therefore being justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ:

verses.name: Romans 5:2
verses.text: By whom also we have access by faith into this grace wherein we stand, and rejoice in hope of the glory of God.

verses.name: Romans 5:3
verses.text: And not only so, but we glory in tribulations also: knowing that tribulation worketh patience;

verses.name: Romans 5:4
verses.text: And patience, experience; and experience, hope:

verses.name: Romans 5:5
verses.text: And hope maketh not ashamed; because the love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us.

verses.name: Romans 5:6
verses.text: For when we were yet without strength, in due time Christ died for the ungodly.
